import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardTitle, CardImg, CardBody, Button, Modal } from 'reactstrap'; const BookCard = ({ thumbnail, title, description, authors, previewLink, }) => { // States const [modal, setModal] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setModal(!modal); return ( {title}
{title}
{/*

Page Count: {pageCount}

Language : {language}

Authors : {authors}

Publisher : {publisher}

*/}
{description}
{/*
Preview Link
Info Link
*/} ); }; export default BookCard;
